span.strong: ***The New Glarus School District will be closed beginning Monday, March 16, 2020 and will remain closed pending guidance from our local, state and federal health officials***

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 16px;

p.span: Small Schools, BIG Opportunities - New Glarus School District is a top-rated school district that offers students extensive curricular and extra-curricular opportunities within a small school setting. With a school population of just less than 1000 students, teachers form strong relationships with their students and are committed to each child reaching his or her potential in a safe learning environment.

div.div: Thank you, parents and staff members, for completing the recent surveys regarding the Covid-19 pandemic and the "Continued Learning Plan." READ MORE... about Survey Results - Covid-19 pandemic
Virtual School Board Meeting Information & Instructions. READ MORE... about Virtual School Board Meetings
In the New Glarus School District the health, safety and well-being of our students and staff are our top priorities. READ MORE... about Coronavirus - Parent Communications
UW-Madison Fellowship Award - Field Day Lab

New Glarus High School teacher Peter Bertling has been awarded a fellowship from Field Day Lab at UW-Madison. This award recognizes Mr. Bertling's excellence in teaching and commitment to innovation in the classroom. READ MORE... about UW-Madison Fellowship Award - Field Day Lab
The public school open enrollment application season for the 2020-2021 school year is February 3, 2020 to April 30, 2020. READ MORE... about 2020-2021 Open Enrollment Information

Three New Glarus teachers were recently informed that they achieved National Board Certification, one of the teaching profession's highest marks of achievement. READ MORE... about Teachers Achieve National Board Certification
NGSD Honored on AP District Honor Roll

New Glarus School District place on the College Board's 10 Annual AP District Honor Roll for Significant Gains in Student Access and Success. 250 School Districts across the U.S. and Canada are honored. READ MORE... about NGSD Honored on AP District Honor Roll
New Glarus School District Facility Survey Results

The New Glarus School District recently heard the results of the Community Facility Study. The results were presented by School Perceptions, a company that has conducted over 10,000 surveys for schools and districts across the country. READ MORE... about New Glarus School District Facility Survey Results
School Perceptions presented the results of the recent facilities survey to the School Board on Monday evening. Click the link below to view the results. READ MORE... about Facility Survey Results

The New Glarus School District is required to notify families of specific annual notices related to students and school programs that Wisconsin school districts are required by law to provide. READ MORE... about District Notices
New Glarus School District1701 2nd Street, New Glarus, WI 53574 | Phone 608-527-2410
